name: WordSearch Puzzle
description:
★★★ NEW! PUZZLE OF THE DAY & ONLINE LEADERBOARDS ★★★
Play unlimited word puzzles for less than the price of a single puzzle book! A must-have for word search enthusiasts and casual players.


Features include:
★ Millions of new unique puzzles
★ Extra hard Puzzles of the Day
★ Online global PotD scores
★ Over 50 handcrafted word topics
★ Large word lists, always something fresh
★ Quick & easy word entry (tap or slide to circle words)
★ Word grid sizes from 11x11 to 19x19
★ 3 difficulty levels, challenge yourself
★ Share Puzzle IDs, challenge your friends
★ Best games list, track your progress
★ Statistics
★ Email printable puzzles to your friends!

Also see our new word game ▶ Word Shaker ◀
